actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-8.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 260 - 149 (Record Vote No: 20).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1189) to provide additional emergency credit to farm producers; to provide funds to forego foreclosure and defer payment of indebtedness; and to determine damages caused by embargoes on the sale and delivery of agricultural commodities, either through direct embargo or failure to sell competitively; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1189 (emergency credit to farmers).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1189) to provide additional emergency credit to farm producers; to provide funds to forego foreclosure and defer payment of indebtedness; and to determine damages caused by embargoes on the sale and delivery of agricultural commodities, either through direct embargo or failure to sell competitively; and for other purposes.
